text: Shanksville, Pennsylvania is a small borough in Somerset County, Pennsylvania. About 200 people live there. The town is from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The area became well-known worldwide when United Airlines Flight 93 crashed into a field during the September 11 attacks. The town was founded in 1798. ==References== ==Other websites== * Flight 93 National Memorial (U.S. National Park Service) Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania Category:1798 establishments in the United States Category:1790s establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Shanksville, Pennsylvania
